successes.title: Stryd – The World’s First Wearable Power Meter for Running
successes.description: Stryd is the world’s first wearable power meter. With your support, we’ll give runners the one number that can help them run better.

Pledges.description: When you support us, you are supporting our mission to help the world run better. And, we’ll reward you for that with $15 OFF Stryd in our online store. In addition, you’ll get backer-only training advice from the Stryd coaches – and VIP invites to our private events around the world.

Be one of the first 1,000 people to run with power, and you’ll Save $20 OFF the retail price. You’ll get access to our mobile apps and our online training center – along with a training program from one of our elite coaches.  In addition, you’ll get exclusive access to our private Stryd community, which includes some of the world’s top triathletes and runners.
